description:
Shapefile created based on the outer en inner boundary of the OSPAR maritime area. Both shapefiles were downloaded from the OSPAR website and merged into 1 file (2014-04-25).
The coastline used is EEA coastline for analysis (line) - version 1.0, Jun. 2013 from the European Environment Agency.
keywords: Area management / restriction / regulation zones & reporting units
name: OSPAR Regions (North-East Atlantic, 2014)
